actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B of medicare for air fluidized based bed therapy in nursing facilities.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to cover air fluidized bead bed therapy in nursing facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under part B of medicare for air fluidized based bed therapy in nursing facilities.
